codeExamples.name: Requesting a Signature via your App (Embedded Signing)
codeExamples.description: This code example demonstrates how to collect eSignatures via DocuSign from within your app without needing to send the signer an email or direct them to an external URL, a process also known as Embedded Signing.

codeExamples.name: Requesting a Signature via Email (Remote Signing)
codeExamples.description: This code example demonstrates how to send a signature request for a signer to read and sign via an email, also known as a remote signature request.

codeExamples.name: Getting Envelope Information
codeExamples.description: This code example demonstrates how to get the full set of data associated with an envelope that was sent by your app.

codeExamples.name: Get an envelope's basic information
codeExamples.description: This code example demonstrates how to collect e-ignatures via DocuSign from within your app without needing to send the signer an email or direct them to an external URL, a process also known as Embedded Signing.

codeExamples.name: Listing Envelope Recipients
codeExamples.description: This code example demonstrates how to retrieve a list of all envelope recipients and their associated status details, such as the signing status for each envelope document.

codeExamples.name: Listing Envelope Documents
codeExamples.description: This code example demonstrates how to retrieve a list of all documents within a specific envelope.

codeExamples.name: Downloading Envelope Documents
codeExamples.description: This code example demonstrates how to retrieve documents from an envelope, such as the generated seal (which is created when a document is completed), a composite PDF of all documents, a zip file containing everything, or a specific document attachment within the envelope.
